title: In 'While We're Young,' The Border Between Ridicule And Sympathy Is Thin
teaser: Noah Baumbach's new comedy is about a couple in their 40s who befriend 20-something hipsters and go wild. It gets off to a fun start, but two-thirds of the way through takes a surprising turn.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
